directions: Crush the ramen noodles in a  bowl, and stir in the beef seasoning packet, sunflower seeds, almonds, green onions, oil and vinegar dressing, and sugar, mixing until the sugar is dissolved.
Place the coleslaw mix into a large salad bowl, pour the dressing mixture over, and toss lightly to combine well. Refrigerate at least 1 hour before serving.
ingredients: 1 (3 ounce) package beef flavor ramen noodles with seasoning packet
1 (3 ounce) package roasted sunflower seed kernels
1 cup bottled oil and vinegar salad dressing (such as Newman's Own®)
title: Dad's Asian Slaw
